Description: Tasks1. Responsible to work on Seat Serienbetreuung for Various carlines at Mercedes Benz Car Group.2. Will be working towards achieving Technical Feasibility, packaging of Seat in the Vehicle Environment, Manufacturing Feasibility for Seat Components, Testing and Homologation requirements.3. Responsible to work on product changes and its implementation for seat components4. To be able to work on Global working/communication models5. Establish good connect with Supplier, MB Plants and Quality/Logistics/MP teams.6. Command on solid and surfacing using UGNX software7. Should be able to work independently with minimum supervision.8. Assist team leader to achieve company goals / objectives.9. Working knowledge about either of Enovia/VPM/Team Centre is a must.10. Knowledge of Product Structure, Creation of BOM / Assembly structure in PLM12. Working knowledge on Quality checkers like Q Checker (Daimler)13. Knowledge on Product Change Management Process14. Data Management, Release Control and Co-ordination, Understanding Drawing standards.15. Experience in Mercedes-Benz norms and DBL standards, DIALOG, SMARAGD and Team center will be an added advantage.16. Able to work as an independent player with min. guidance.17. Additional skills & experience:- German language- International work experience- Development experience in Mercedes-Benz or similar productsEngineering degree in Mechanical or equivalentJob Details
